nodes.text: Verpine zal alloy mesh was a type of armor that was manufactured by the Verpine during the years before and after the Jedi Civil War. The armor offered outstanding protection against most types of attacks due to its utilization of Zal alloy, however, this also increased the price of the armor immensely.

This armor can be acquired in the game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic on the planet Lehon as a reward from the Black Rakata war leader outside the settlement for killing the Mandalorian Hunters near the Temple of the Ancients. It is also found on Calo Nord after defeating him in battle except called Calo Nord's battle armor.
It is also possible to randomly acquire this armor in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. It is the second best armor in the game.
One can also be purchased from the cantina on Korriban after retrieving the spice in the secret compartment from the Ebon Hawk's cargo hold for a Rodian smuggler just outside.
